item.title: 特斯拉 6 月在华电动车销量同比增长 3.7% 至 61,000 辆
item.description: 特斯拉中国公司周四公布的数据显示，特斯拉电动汽车 6 月份销量同比增长 3.7%。【原文：Tesla's electric vehicle sales in June rose 3.7% from a year earlier, according to Tesla China on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国非农就业数据测试前亚洲股市上扬；特朗普的税收法案成为焦点
item.description: 周四，亚洲股市走高，原因是投资者在等待一份关键的美国就业报告，该报告可能为美联储即将降息提供理由，同时也在等待国会通过一项大规模的美国税收和支出法案。【原文：Asian shares edged higher on Thursday as investors braced for a key U.S. jobs report that may justify imminent rate cuts by the Federal Reserve and waited on the passage of a massive U.S. tax and spending bill in Congress.】

item.title: 美国取消出口限制后，Cadence 表示将恢复在中国的软件准入
item.description: 鏗騰設計系統公司（Cadence Design Systems）周四表示，美國已解除對中國芯片設計軟件的出口限制，該公司正在恢復受影響客戶對軟件和技術的使用。【原文：Cadence Design Systems said on Thursday the U.S. had lifted export restrictions on chip design software for China and that it was in the process of restoring access to software and technology to affected customers.】

item.title: 巴克莱银行调整亚太地区投资银行领导层，提升地区影响力
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays）周四宣布了亚太地区投资银行部的一系列高管任命，旨在推动该地区的增长，同时在全球范围内审查该业务的资本分配。【原文：Barclays announced on Thursday a series of executive appointments within its Asia Pacific investment banking division, aiming to drive regional growth even as it globally reviews capital allocation to the business.】

item.title: 交易员翘首以待美国非农就业数据，美元随之漂移
item.description: 在7月9日关税最后期限到来之前，美国和越南之间达成的一项贸易协定助长了对未来可能达成的交易的乐观情绪，而投资者则将目光投向了薪资数据，以评估美联储的下一步行动。【原文：The dollar wobbled on Thursday after a trade agreement between the United States and Vietnam fuelled optimism over potential future deals ahead of a July 9 tariff deadline, while investors looked to payrolls to assess the Federal Reserve's next steps.】

item.title: 关键就业报告发布前，美国需求疲软的迹象导致石油下跌
item.description: 周四油价下跌，扭转了上一交易日的涨势，原因是政府数据显示全球最大的原油消费国美国的库存意外增加，市场担心美国需求疲软。【原文：Oil prices eased on Thursday, reversing gains from the previous session, on concerns over weak U.S. demand after government data showed a surprise build in inventories in the world's biggest crude consumer.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，西门子称美国已解除对中国的芯片软件禁令
item.description: 彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周三援引德国西门子公司的一份声明报道称，该公司已收到美国政府的通知，称对华芯片设计软件出口限制已被取消。【原文：Germany's Siemens AG has received a notice from the U.S. government saying that export restrictions on chip design software for China have been lifted, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing a statement from the company.】

item.title: 消息人士称，特朗普与越南达成协议后，美国和印度推动贸易协定的达成
item.description: 熟悉谈判情况的消息人士称，美国和印度的贸易谈判代表周三正在努力争取在唐纳德-特朗普总统规定的7月9日谈判截止日期之前达成一项降低关税的协议，但有关美国乳制品和农业的分歧仍未得到解决。【原文：U.S. and India trade negotiators were pushing on Wednesday to try to land a tariff-reducing deal ahead of President Donald Trump's July 9 negotiating deadline, but disagreements over U.S. dairy and agriculture remained unresolved, sources familiar with the talks said.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，Starboard Value 持有 Tripadvisor 超过 9% 的股份
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三报道，激进投资者 Starboard Value 已持有在线旅游公司 Tripadvisor 超过 9% 的股份。【原文：Activist investor Starboard Value has built an over 9% stake in online travel firm Tripadvisor , the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 邦吉公司（Bunge）与谷物装卸商 Viterra 完成拖延已久的大型合并
item.description: 全球农业综合企业邦吉全球公司（Bunge Global）表示，在宣布与嘉能可（Glencore）支持的维泰拉公司（Viterra）进行价值 340 亿美元的巨额交易两年后，该公司于本周三正式完成了拖延已久的合并交易。【原文：Global agribusiness Bunge Global said it officially closed a long-delayed deal to merge with Glencore-backed Viterra on Wednesday, two years after announcing the $34 billion mega-deal.】

item.title: 埃克森、卡塔尔能源合资公司请求美国监管机构批准从 10 月 1 日起再出口液化天然气
item.description: 埃克森美孚和卡塔尔能源公司（QatarEnergy）拥有的金色通道液化天然气公司（Golden Pass LNG）已向美国监管机构申请从 10 月 1 日起重新出口液化天然气的许可，因为该出口工厂在之前的延误后已接近投产。【原文：Golden Pass LNG, which is owned by Exxon Mobil and QatarEnergy, has asked U.S. regulators for permission to re-export liquefied natural gas from October 1, as the export plant nears production after previous delays.】

item.title: 美国解除对企业产品公司向中国运输乙烷的限制
item.description: 美国企业产品合伙公司（Enterprise Products Partners）周三表示，美国已为该公司恢复对中国的乙烷运输扫清了障碍，取消了几周前因中美贸易战从关税转向供应链而实施的限制性许可要求。【原文：The U.S. has cleared the way for Enterprise Products Partners to resume ethane shipments to China, the company said on Wednesday, revoking a restrictive license requirement that was put in place just weeks ago as the U.S.-China trade war turned from tariffs to supply chains.】

item.title: 邮件称美国联邦储备委员会银行监管主管接受收购
item.description: 根据路透社看到的吉布森发给美联储官员的一封电子邮件，美国联邦储备委员会监督和监管部主任迈克尔-吉布森（Michael Gibson）已接受自愿买断，并将于本月底退休，此前他已在央行工作了 33 年。【原文：Michael Gibson, director of the U.S. Federal Reserve's supervision and regulation division, has accepted a voluntary buyout and will retire at the end of this month after 33 years at the central bank, according to an email from Gibson to Fed officials seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 交易日：为就业报告做好准备
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 巴西航空工业公司第二季度交付 61 架飞机，同比增长 30
item.description: 巴西飞机制造商巴西航空工业公司（Embraer）周三表示，2025 年第二季度交付了 61 架飞机，同比增长 30%。【原文：Brazilian planemaker Embraer said on Wednesday it delivered 61 aircraft in the second quarter of 2025, a 30% increase from a year earlier.】

item.title: OpenAI 称未与 Robinhood 合作开发股票代币
item.description: OpenAI 周三表示，它尚未与 Robinhood 合作开发该交易平台本周早些时候推出的股票代币。【原文：OpenAI said on Wednesday it has not partnered with Robinhood for the stock tokens the trading platform unveiled earlier this week.】

item.title: 中国长安汽车高管表示计划在欧洲建厂
item.description: 一位高管周三告诉路透社，中国汽车制造商长安汽车计划在欧洲建厂，以支持其未来在欧洲大陆的销售。【原文：Chinese automaker Changan plans a European factory to support its future sales on the continent and is already weighing up possible locations for the plant, an executive told Reuters on Wednesday.】

item.title: 电动汽车制造商 Lucid 因需求疲软，第二季度交付量不及预期
item.description: Lucid 周三未能达到华尔街对其第二季度交付量的预期，原因是消费者在应对经济不确定性和成本上升时对其豪华电动汽车的需求疲软。【原文：Lucid missed Wall Street expectations for second-quarter deliveries on Wednesday, hit by softer demand for its luxury electric vehicles as consumers grapple with economic uncertainty and higher costs.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会与 SolarWinds 达成初步协议，结束违约诉讼
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会（U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission）周三在一份法庭文件中表示，该委员会已与 SolarWinds 公司及其高级安全官原则上达成协议，结束与该软件公司与俄罗斯有关的网络攻击相关的诉讼。【原文：The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission has reached a deal in principle with SolarWinds Corp and its top security officer to end litigation tied to a Russia-linked cyberattack involving the software firm, they said in a court filing on Wednesday.】

item.title: AOS 就未经授权运输华为产品与美国达成和解
item.description: 根据美国商务部周三发布的一项命令，Alpha and Omega Semiconductor Limited 已同意支付 425 万美元，与美国商务部达成和解，原因是该公司向中国华为技术公司运送物品违反了出口法规。【原文：Alpha and Omega Semiconductor Limited has agreed to pay $4.25 million to settle with the U.S. Department of Commerce for shipping items to China's Huawei Technologies in violation of export regulations, according to a department order posted on Wednesday.】

item.title: 特朗普和解引发 CBS 新闻 "广泛困扰
item.description: 派拉蒙环球公司（Paramount Global）与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）提起的《60 分钟》（60 Minutes）诉讼达成和解，周三引发了哥伦比亚广播公司（CBS News）现任和前任员工、新闻自由倡导者和立法者的谴责。【原文：Paramount Global's settlement of the "60 Minutes" lawsuit filed by U.S. President Donald Trump provoked condemnation on Wednesday from CBS News current and former employees, press freedom advocates and legislators.】

item.title: 加密货币关注下一个前沿领域，瑞波币申请美国国家银行特许经营权
item.description: 加密货币公司瑞波（Ripple）的首席执行官布拉德-加林豪斯（Brad Garlinghouse）周三在社交媒体上发文称，该公司正在申请美国国家银行的特许经营权。【原文：Crypto firm Ripple is applying for a national bank charter in the U.S., its CEO Brad Garlinghouse wrote in a social media post on Wednesday, shortly after a similar step by stablecoin giant Circle .】

item.title: 耐克和其他零售商股票因特朗普与越南达成降低关税的贸易协议而上涨
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示已与越南达成贸易协议，将对来自东南亚国家的许多进口商品征收低于最初预期的关税后，耐克和其他服装制造商的股票周三上涨。【原文：Shares of Nike and other apparel makers rose on Wednesday after U.S. President Donald Trump said he had struck a trade deal with Vietnam that would impose a lower than initially expected tariff rate on many imports from the Southeast Asian country.】

item.title: 俄罗斯储蓄银行首席执行官对俄罗斯推动创建数字卢布感到困惑
item.description: 俄罗斯最大的银行储蓄银行（Sberbank）首席执行官格尔曼-格莱夫（German Gref）周三表示，除了跨境结算可能出现的例外情况外，他看不到俄罗斯发展数字卢布的任何潜在好处。【原文：German Gref, CEO of Russia's dominant lender Sberbank , on Wednesday said he did not see any potential benefits to Russia's development of the digital rouble beyond the possible exception of cross-border settlements.】

item.title: 第二季度石油期货和期权交易量创历史新高，投资者把握波动趋势
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普发动贸易战，中东地缘政治冲突升级，洲际交易所（ICE）第二季度石油期货和期权交易总量创下历史新高。【原文：Total oil futures and options lots traded on the Intercontinental Exchange (ICE) hit record highs in the second quarter, as U.S. President Donald Trump waged a trade war and geopolitical conflicts in the Middle East escalated.】

item.title: Downdetector 显示，美国数以千计的用户无法使用 Meta's Instagram
item.description: 据断电跟踪网站 Downdetector.com 称，周三，美国有数千名用户的 Meta Platforms Instagram 出现故障。【原文：Meta Platforms' Instagram was down for thousands of users in the U.S. on Wednesday, according to outage tracking website Downdetector.com.】

item.title: 世卫组织推动各国将含糖饮料、酒精和烟草的价格提高 50
item.description: 世界卫生组织正在推动各国在未来 10 年内通过征税将含糖饮料、酒精和烟草的价格提高 50%，这是对征税帮助解决慢性公共卫生问题的最有力支持。【原文：The World Health Organization is pushing countries to raise the prices of sugary drinks, alcohol and tobacco by 50% over the next 10 years through taxation, its strongest backing yet for taxes to help tackle chronic public health problems.】

item.title: 欧盟利用私人资金推动量子技术发展
item.description: 欧盟技术负责人亨娜-维尔库宁（Henna Virkkunen）周三表示，欧盟正在寻求吸引私人资金，以帮助欧盟到2030年在量子技术领域占据领先地位，因为欧盟正努力减少在该领域对美国和中国的依赖。【原文：The European Union is seeking to attract private funding to help it take the lead in quantum technology by 2030, EU tech chief Henna Virkkunen said on Wednesday, as the bloc works to cut its reliance in the sector on the United States and China.】

item.title: 乔治-阿玛尼（Giorgio Armani）2024 年业绩艰难，核心利润下降 24%，加大投资力度
item.description: 意大利时装品牌乔治-阿玛尼（Giorgio Armani）周三表示，受收入下降和运营成本略有增加的影响，公司去年的核心利润下降了 24%。【原文：Italian fashion house Giorgio Armani said on Wednesday its core profit dropped 24% last year hit by declining revenues and a slight increase in operating costs.】

item.title: 特朗普税收和支出巨额法案的主要内容
item.description: 共和党控制的国会可能很快就会最终批准一项全面的税收和支出法案，该法案包含了唐纳德-特朗普总统的许多国内优先事项。【原文：The Republican-controlled Congress could soon give final approval to a sweeping tax and spending bill that incorporates many of President Donald Trump's top domestic priorities.】
